message.content:
To find the specific line item for costs of general management and administration, I need to identify the line that reports administrative expenses on the income statement.

Looking at the provided data:

| Account | Amount | Date |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Administrative Expenses | 294,758.34 | 2024-02-05 |

This line item clearly represents the costs related to the general management and administration of the entity as a whole.

Therefore, the value of costs of general management and administration is 294,758.34.
